noDataMessage: We’re still learning your flow patterns in this time range. Keep recording your sessions, and we’ll provide personalized insights soon.

interruptions.unlocks: leaving the app during the timer
interruptions.scrolls: scrolling or switching tasks during the timer

danger: flow stability is at high risk.
maintaining flow is difficult right now.
stable: you’re sustaining a solid level of flow.
good: your flow condition is near peak.

excellent: aim to keep flow at this level.
continue staying in flow at a high level.
risingStable: You're steadily improving. As you get more comfortable, try extending your flow time little by little.
Great upward trend. Make it a goal to gradually increase your session length.
You're making good progress. It might be a good time to start lengthening your flow sessions step by step.
You're heading in the right direction. Try increasing your flow duration gradually.
stableHigh: continue maintaining a strong level of flow.
keep up the steady flow pattern.
minorImprovement: reduce {{issue}} slightly to refine your results.
a small adjustment to {{issue}} will bring you closer to optimal.
reducing {{issue}} a bit will improve overall quality.
addressing {{issue}} will further strengthen your flow.
risingMedium: You're showing improvement! Try extending your flow sessions step by step.
Good progress. Gradually increase your session length as you build momentum.
You're on the right track. Focus on extending your flow time little by little.
Positive trend. Work on lengthening your flow periods progressively.
risingWithTip: lower '{{issue}}' further to support the trend (avg {{count}} times).
risingMultiTip: focus on reducing '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times) for better flow control.
noIssue: aim to lengthen flow time now.
singleIssue: primary disruption: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—work on reducing this.
'{{issue}}' is affecting your flow (avg {{count}} times)—address this factor.
flow loss is mostly linked to '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times).
main distraction detected: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—prioritize improvement here.
multiIssue: lower both '{{issue1}}' (avg {{count1}}) and '{{issue2}}' (avg {{count2}}) for steadier flow.
lowScoreNoIssue: increase session length step by step.
extend duration progressively to build stamina.
add a few more minutes to each session.
lowScoreWithIssue: your main challenge is '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—tackle this first.
lower the impact of '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times) to improve flow results.
